text:
kShaqtramanuq sahO# yajaqtrEndra# dEqvEBiqranu# tE nRuqShahyE$ || 
Ayasmi$n thsaqptavA#saqvA stiShTha#nti svAqruhO# yathA |
RuShi#r.ha dIrGaqSrutta#maq indra#sya GaqrmO ati#thiH || 
AqmAsu# paqkvamaira#yaq A sUrya(gm)# rOhayO diqvi | 
GaqrmaM na sAma#M tapatA suvRuqktiBiq-rjuShTaqM girva#NasEq gira#H || 
indraqmid gAqthinO# bRuqhadindra# maqrkEBi# raqrkiNa#H | indraqM ~MvANI#ranUShata || 
gAya#nti tvA gAyaqtriNO - [  ] 47
